item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, December 28, 2024 at 3:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Liberating Wi-Fi on the ESP32 [video] (70 points | 9 comments)
2. Should more of us be moving to live near friends? (231 points | 119 comments)
3. Plasticlist Report – Data on plastic chemicals in Bay Area foods (338 points | 109 comments)
4. Scale Model of Boeing 777-300ER, Made from Manila Folders (413 points | 66 comments)
5. Mixin is a trait/mixin and bytecode weaving framework for Java using ASM (7 points | discuss)
6. How to Create HTML/ZIP/PNG Polyglot Files (45 points | 12 comments)
7. That's Not an Abstraction, That's Just a Layer of Indirection (11 points | 1 comment)
8. Show HN: Minimal, self-hosted exercise tracker (55 points | 15 comments)
9. TSMC's Arizona Plant to Start Making Advanced Chips (62 points | 10 comments)
10. Demystifying Common Microcontroller Debug Protocols [video] (46 points | discuss)
11. Show HN: I made a web app to bring children's drawings to life (119 points | 46 comments)
12. The hydraulic systems of the Alhambra Palace [video] (63 points | 7 comments)
13. 400TB Single Cluster: OceanBase Powers Kwai`s Core Business (20 points | discuss)
14. Breaking the Mirror – A Look at Apple's New iPhone Remote Control Feature [video] (47 points | 2 comments)
15. 1584 LAN party photos from 1996 – 2010 from Australia's island state archived (76 points | 29 comments)
16. Bench accounting services shutting down (204 points | 209 comments)
17. Taxi drivers offer a clue to Alzheimer's risk (88 points | 82 comments)
18. The paper passport's days are numbered (63 points | 137 comments)
19. VW breach exposes location of 800k electric vehicles (156 points | 147 comments)
20. Show HN: Instantly visualize any codebase as an interactive diagram (148 points | 51 comments)
21. DivestOS ROM shuts after ten years (90 points | 54 comments)
22. Show HN: Caravan, a flexible, transport-based logging system for TypeScript apps (11 points | 1 comment)
23. Show HN: I send myself automated emails to practice Dutch (144 points | 89 comments)
24. The new science of controlling lucid dreams (108 points | 82 comments)
25. Complain and Propose (2014) (74 points | 28 comments)
26. They have not been trained for this (486 points | 82 comments)
27. Pseudonymity in Academic Publishing (26 points | 6 comments)
28. Programming Lewis Carroll's Memoria Technica (20 points | 1 comment)
29. Evolution journal editors resign en masse to protest Elsevier changes (6 points | discuss)
30. Ghostty 1.0 (2103 points | 612 comments)
